subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: A seven-time Tour de France winner, Lance Armstrong, 39, said that he wanted to spend more time with his family and that his age was catching up to him.
snippet: A seven-time Tour de France winner, Lance Armstrong, 39, said that he wanted to spend more time with his family and that his age was catching up to him.
